face_care.title: Facial Treatments
face_care.description: A set of treatments aimed at restoring and maintaining the skin when facing dull tone, dryness, uneven texture, acne or age-related changes. Selected based on skin condition — from basic cleansing to DMK revision protocols and biostimulation.

type.name: Event-Ready Treatment: Mother of the Bride

body_care.title: Body Treatments
body_care.description: A procedure for those seeking a visible effect after one session: smoother skin texture, reduced puffiness and an overall sense of lightness. Recommended for decreased tone, local stagnation and hydration deficits.

devices.title: Device-Based Treatments
devices.description: Methods for aesthetic correction and regeneration through advanced technology. Plasonic — active substance delivery via plasma (PlaPass) and ultrasound (SonoPass): rejuvenation, support for problematic skin and pigmentation, deep hydration and renewal. Stratosphere — German device for body sculpting and massage. Recommended in cases of reduced elasticity, skin texture issues, puffiness and age-related changes. Selected according to goals (lifting, lymphatic drainage, texture, hydration).

items.name: Plasonic
items.description: Substance delivery via plasma (PlaPass) and ultrasound (SonoPass) in one system. Targets rejuvenation, pigmentation issues, problem skin, and boosts regeneration + hydration.

items.name: Stratosphere
items.description: German device for body contouring and machine massage

laser.title: Laser Hair Removal (Soprano Titanium)
laser.description: Safe and comfortable Soprano Titanium laser hair removal — a fast and gentle solution for unwanted hair. Ideal for all skin phototypes, including sensitive skin and facial areas.
